title: Lamb tabbouleh with fresh herbs
ingredients: ['400 g (14 oz) lean lamb neck fillets, trimmed of fat', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of ½ lemon', '1 garlic clove, crushed', 'fresh mint leaves to garnish', 'Tabbouleh', '250 g (8½ oz) bulghur wheat', '400 ml (14 fl oz) boiling water', '12 cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 yellow or orange pepper, seeded and diced', '7.5 cm (3 in) piece cucumber, diced', '4 spring onions, sliced', 'handful of fresh mint, roughly chopped', 'handful of parsley, roughly chopped', 'Lemon dressing', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of ½ lemon', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 tsp clear honey', 'salt and pepper']
